description:
Perfect for crafting marshmallow toasting sticks, honing whittling skills, and prepping lunch, the Opinel Junior is a versatile tool. With its iconic styling, an Opinel knife is instantly recognizable, from the ergonomic handle, to the intuitive locking mechanism, there is a reason these knives are classics.

  • 12C27 Sandvik stainless steel blade has a rounded tip for increased safety
  • Blade locks open and closed with an easy to use twist collar
  • Durable composite handle isn’t effected by the elements
  • Integrated a 110dB survival whistle
name: Opinel #7 Outdoor Junior Knife - Youths
